quotes.quote: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuchs

quotes.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, itâ€™s bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.quote: UNIX is simple. It just takes a genius to understand its simplicity.
quotes.author: Dennis M. Ritchie

quotes.quote: Formal education will make you a living. Self-education will make you a fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Programming is not easy like Sunday morning, it is silent poetry.
quotes.author: Waseem Latif

quotes.quote: Software being 'Done' is like lawn being 'Mowed'.
quotes.author: Jim Benson

quotes.quote: 90% of the functionality delivered now is better than 100% delivered never.
quotes.author: Brian W. Kernighan & P. J. Plaugher

quotes.quote: A good API is not just easy to use but also hard to misuse.
quotes.author: Jbd

quotes.quote: Hardware eventually fails. Software eventually works.
quotes.author: Michael Hurting

quotes.quote: That which optimizes one part of the system necessarily undermines the system as a whole.
quotes.author: Eric Ries

quotes.quote: These days, the problem isn't how to innovate; it's how to get society to adopt the good ideas that already exist.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.quote: Teams are immutable. Every time someone leaves, or joins, you have a new team, not a changed team.
quotes.author: Richard Dalton

quotes.quote: What one programmer can do in one month, two programmers can do in two months.
quotes.author: Frederick P. Brooks

quotes.quote: Treat your code like poetry and take it to the edge of the bare minimum.
quotes.author: Ilyo

quotes.quote: Things that are impossible just take longer.
quotes.author: Ian Hickson

quotes.quote: No code is faster than no code.
quotes.author: Merb Motto

quotes.quote: Good engineers make solutions obsolete. Great engineers make themselves obsolete.
quotes.author: Jordan W

quotes.quote: A program is like a poem: you cannot write a poem without writing it.
quotes.author: E. W. Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Blame the implementation, not the technique.
quotes.author: Tim Kadlec

quotes.quote: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful.
quotes.author: John Maeda
